price: 39. En degene die, wanneer zij door onrecht worden getroffen, voor zichzelf opkomen.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
